name: Arena Derby 2
description:
Enjoy the world of destruction with Arena Derby 2!

Breathtaking battles, unique arenas and different cars won't leave anyone indifferent!

Some of the awesome features of this game:
- Unique battle system
- Capture the flag! - mode
- 10+ unique cars
- Upgradeable car
- Weapon system (rockets)
- Easy control: tilt, arrows
- A powerful artificial intelligence of opponents
- Different unique arenas
- Different weather conditions
- Amazing graphics and effects

Quickly take the car and go to smash!
